thread.title: Lone Star pays $36M for Golden Valley building
thread.title_full: Lone Star pays $36M for Golden Valley building

author: Finance and Commerce Staff
title: Lone Star pays $36M for Golden Valley building
text:
Home / News / Real Estate / Lone Star pays $36M for Golden Valley building The 190,758-square-foot Golden Hills Office Center, at 701 Xenia Ave. S. in Golden Valley, was among least 21 Minnesota office buildings sold by Investors Real Estate Trust. (Submitted photo: CoStar) Lone Star pays $36M for Golden Valley building By: Finance and Commerce Staff August 7, 2015 4:10 pm 0 Dallas-based Lone Star Funds purchased the Golden Valley office building as part of a $250 million portfolio deal.
